item.description:
Whether you are attending the Tufts theater event at 8PM or not, you are welcome to join us for dinner and drinks at Sabur Restaurant and Lounge on Holland Street, just up the street from the TAB building. Although this will be my first time dining at Sabur, it comes highly recommended from several colleagues as well as from Yelp! where it got four stars.

The restaurant's menu features multi-ethnic cuisine inspired by the rustic fare of the Mediterranean region with exotic flavors and aromas of regions ranging from Italy, Greece, Southern France, and the Balkans to North Africa and beyond. The food is sophisticated in flavor, rustic in charm, and unpretentious in appearance.
item.name: Jumbo Dinner: Sabur Restaurant & Lounge
